description: Build essential financial literacy skills for life success. Learn budgeting, saving, banking, and smart money decisions to secure your financial future.

lessons.title: Financial Foundations
lessons.description: Learn basic financial concepts, money values, and needs vs wants

lessons.title: Banking and Accounts
lessons.description: Understand banking basics, account types, and safety practices

lessons.title: Budgeting Mastery
lessons.description: Create budgets, track expenses, and manage income effectively

lessons.title: Smart Saving Strategies
lessons.description: Explore savings accounts, compound interest, and goal setting

lessons.title: Introduction to Investing
lessons.description: Learn basic investment concepts and long-term wealth building

lessons.title: Credit, Debt, and Future Planning
lessons.description: Understand credit scores, responsible borrowing, and financial goals

lessons.title: Financial Decision-Making Game
lessons.description: Apply your knowledge in an interactive money management simulation
